content.title: cold-heart
content.content: It turns one cc spell into a powerful frost attack. Because of this build focus on mastery and critic, this new spell damage synergies very well.

content.title: murderous-efficiency
content.content: Consuming [Killing Machine] can generate a rune, giving the chance to spend even more Runic Power. Important mechanic, especially, during the [Breath of Sindragosa's] window

content.title: killing-machine
content.content: It provokes that the next [Obliterate] deals frost damage and be critic. The frost part it's quite significant, because the main stat of the build is mastery. Besides that, the second secondary stat is the critic, having a good chance to generate critic continuously

key.title: breath-of-sindragosa
key.content:
Breath of frost that does damage in cone in front of the character to all enemies.This ability is channeled and consumes a lot of runic power.
 Meanwhile the ability is channeled, the player has to generate as much runic power as possible 
 We will search ways to improve the damage during the channeling of Breath of Sindragosa, like empowering skills and generating skill of Runic Power

content.title: pillar-of-frost
content.content:
The skill will improve the strength in 15%, +1% for every rune spent meanwhile the skill is active.
 This skill has a lot of synergy with Breath of Sindragosa, because in order to keep 'up' the Breath, the death knight has to keep spending runes accumulating more strength in the process

content.title: empower-rune-weapon
content.content: This skill will increase the haste, giving the chance to attack and generate more runes.

content.title: swarming-mist
content.content: Fog that envelops the death knight improving the dodge in 10%, meanwhile, the spell is up. But more importantly, every time, the spell damages an enemy the death knight wins 3 of Runic Power, up to 15 Runic Power per tick scaling by the number of enemies damaged at the same time. Being almost impossible to run out of Runic Power meanwhile this spell is active

content.title: hypothermic-presence
content.content: Skill that will reduce in a 35% the amount of runic power spent for every skill. Excellent skill to help the death knight during the start of the Breath, enabling him to activate other skills and not being extremely aware of Runic Power during the first 8 seconds

content.title: obliterate
content.content: Main ability to spent Runes and generate Runic Power. Main spell to keep helping [Breath of Sindragosa] being up

content.title: frostwyrms-fury
content.content:
Burst area skill, that normally will be used when Breath of Sindragosa is in cd.
 This skill has been improved with the legendary power Absolute Zero
